One of the most addicting games out there, whether you are a cs enthusiast from a bygone age of counter strike 1.6, or someone who just stepped into the world of counter terrorists and terrorists. At first it's feels a bit repetitive and dry but as soon as you step into the competitive mode with friends or solo in a random team, it get really interesting and addictive, an addiction that you can't get rid of.
